news.title: Re-turn: "From supporting grassroots sports projects to funding life-saving medical initiatives, Re-turn is proving that sustainability delivers meaningful and long-lasting benefits"
news.summary: At Electric Picnic 2025, music fans have the chance to make the world a cleaner, greener place, one deposited drink container at a time – thanks to the brilliantly simple and effective Re-turn scheme.

news.title: Jack White calls Trump's changes to the White House 'vulgar'
news.summary: "It's now a vulgar, gold leafed and gaudy, professional wrestler's dressing room," said Jack White.

news.title: GoCar: Making that magic festival pilgrimage easier than ever
news.summary: Should I stay or should I GoCar?... Just add The Clash to your playlist and get ready to rock – ‘cos there’s no better way of getting to your favourite festival than picking up a vehicle from GoCar. It’ll save you money, time and hassle!

news.title: FKA Twigs announces new album EUSEXUA Afterglow
news.summary: The project will be released next month, according to the British artist

news.title: Sigrid announces new album There’s Always More That I Could Say and shares new single ‘Fort Knox’
news.summary: The record will be released on October 24.

news.title: Happy Birthday Philip Lynott: "A complex and wily artist"
news.summary: To mark what would've been Philip Lynott's 76th birthday, we're revisiting Peter Murphy's reflections on the Irish music icon's phenomenal work and legacy. Also featuring contributions from Bob Geldof, Glen Hansard and The Cranberries' Noel Hogan.

news.title: KNEECAP mural appears in West Belfast ahead of Mo Chara hearing
news.summary: The mural is based on a photo from KNEECAP's first Hot Press cover shoot.
